title: Upvote if ur tired of reading yasuo on this board
body:
Fuk yasuo

Time to talk about other champs {{champion:266}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:98}}  ...

Edit: i agree there's a lot of mord too, so removed him

replies.body: And yet you said He-Who-Shall-Not-Be-Named twice, once in the title and once in the body. Downvoting B-)

> [{quoted}](name=EricDagher,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NEoysEMP,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-12-26T21:05:23.893+0000)
>
> B-)

Be honest, you just wanted to make a -cough cough- He-Who-Shall-Not-Be-Named thread that got upvotes lol

Tbh,  no, i'm just tired of seeing -cough cough- He-Who-Shall-Not-Be-Named threads, we already got the idea he's fuked, and riot said they will do something about him. Time to see other champs like {{champion:105}}

I remember the Good Ole Days where we all used to complain about {{champion:105}} 

Good times, those were.
well the hitbox on his ult is crazy messed up right now. it attaches to people more than twice the champions hitbox away.
It's even scarier with Cotton Tail Fizz's ult since the giant carrot chases you down
Fizz  Makes me Wanna kill myself his ult  cant be dodged{{item:3070}}
Yowch.  Its amazing that I never see Fizz down here in the Bronze Basement...how is that possible?
i'm tired of seeing that shit in my games

Lol he got totally dumpstered by this Heimerdinger top lane yesterday it was so fulfilling to see him feed. He came bot to mess with me and my ADC (who was 8/0, I was like 5/1/2.) I sorta just watched helplessly as he windwalled my Q as Lux. I E'd and he E'd to my ADC, avoiding it. I got desperate and just point blank ulted him despite not applying my passive, and he e'd through me to completely dodge it. My ADC died so I flashed away but still died. We totes got outplayed and could have played that better. I just figured one 0/5 Yasuo against two super fed enemies wouldn't be an issue. Let that have been anyone else >_>

I know there's a shitillion Yasuo hate posts but dammit man you triggered me lol
if you are so far ahead and you die to a feeding yasuo you are ASS lmfao.
Yasuo has so much bullshit coddling safety in his kit it actually doesn't surprise me he could pull that off.

Lol I said I misplayed it completely. But to be fair, had that been any other champion in the game there'd be no way to misplay it when you're that fed. The sheer utility his kit offers makes up for any gold difference, and Yauso can sort of hard counter any mage reliant on skillshots.

> and Yauso can sort of hard counter any mage reliant on skillshots.

Yeah, this is one of the things I absolutely hate about him. I can't grasp how half-second cooldown dashes are in anyway fair or balanced when so much of the game is skillshot based. And if you're on someone whose mana costs are still based on 2010's design philosophies, good fucking luck.

I feel like the Baords need a "**Yasuo**" category. Since 40% of the threads i see are something regarding Yasuo.

_**Almighty.**_
I thought the gamplay was already unofficially the Yasuo board.
I am tired of 'upvote if' posts equally.
Right you are! Here, have an upvote friend
this
Yasuo
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
^This one

Agreed.

Let's talk about Shen and how dreamy he is.
Stop trying Shenpai will never notice you.
lvl7 Shenpai player here, just wanted to say that I'm noticing
Technically you notice me not Melledoneus so I still win the internet this day. Muhahahahahaha.
I just want more Mordekaiser threads :^)
Cancer champion. Nobody likes him except of his players.

0 games on yas

i like him

stay mad small son, stay trash at the game too

See here is the thing about yasuo which makes him so infuriating to play against. 

He plays like it's URF and never loses initiative. After probably 500 games seeing yasuo, I would really enjoy for him to just be disabled for a week.

Many champions have the ability to spam spells. {{champion:69}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:6}} just to mention a few, and especially if you get max cdr, most champions will have abilities with just a couple seconds of cooldown, if you think his biggest issue is him being mobile and being able to spam spells then you shouldnt complain.

There is a key difference between a lot of those champions and yasuo, with riven as the one i wouldn't group with the rest of the list. 

His spamming of an ability costs nothing, and offers more than just damage. 
Riven does this too, but spamming a mobility skill far outweighs the power of spamming a damage skill. Even in the case of Yasuo's Q, which basically just acts as another auto attack, also offers an AOE knock up.

To be clear, i never said other champions didn't create the same type of unfun gameplay due to mobility and CD abuse. Riven is one of these champions. Even if she's at a 40% win rate, she's just not fun to play against due to very similar issues as yasuo. Zed is in a similar boat, lee sin, Camille. The list goes on.

Everybody has one of those spamming abilities, might as well put everybody including every single assassin and fighters in that same boat. Honestly talk about Yasuo, knock ups, Zed, Camille, Lee sin. One factor is that they are fun to play and may not be fun to play against, but they are part of the game. So try not to worry about Yasuo game balance (Riot looks into those a lot) and instead figure out what you can do in order to make sure that Yasuo does not crush you.

I know what i can do to make yasuo not crush me. But what's not fun is not being able to pick what i do BECAUSE yasuo is in the fucking game, else i get crushed by him. Or worse, literally not having access to those things because i'm playing blind pick, and i didn't pick a champion which has any reasonable scaling with the items which counter him, or abilities which allow for a playstyle which beats him.

Yes, they are part of the game. THEY SHOULDN'T BE, at least not in the state they are in. This is why shit like grounded debuff needs to be far more common place.

The champions which are the LEAST fun to play against, shouldn't be the champions who are given the kits which are the most fun to play. This is also party the community's fault, but also in part due to riot, that the only thing which seems to be allowed to matter in what makes a game fun or not, is WINNING. I don't care if i lose every match, if i have fun while doing it, but sadly the champions who most likely will win against me in a match are almost always the one which make the game impossible to enjoy, no matter if i'm winning or losing.

> [{quoted}](name=playfive Koopska,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NEoysEMP,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-12-26T21:48:18.526+0000)

I sense you are getting mad since you know that he is a cancer and gets nerfed soon, son.

he won't be nerfed lmfao, meddler said they're watching out yasuo i'm sure he'll just realise that board is garbage 

and even then if yasuo will end up nerfed it won't be major, unlike the yasuo circlejerk that want a yasuo rework or deleting windwall or w/e
but i like yasuo hate threads, it keeps people distracted from hating on my prefered picks...

circle jerking on people circle jerking on yasuo

I like it

You can hate Yasuo and still hate Yasuo haters
As a Yasuo hater myself, Yasuo haters are getting pretty annoying.

Nerf yasuo so people will shut the fuck up about hin

thanks
Even if they do, They won't stop complaining.
It worked with Zed.
Time to talk about mordekaiser? You must be new to this board, he has more threads made asking for buffs than any other champion over the last few months.
cuz that one meme lord

Morde, no thanks

there is already an army of butthurt fanboys that are getting a full VGU but still post every day to complain
Yeah, Riot should delete Yasuo already, so we can talk about something else.
